sentences.en: A grey squirrel is scampering from limb to limb.
sentences.cn: 一只灰色的松鼠在树枝间跳来跳去.

sentences.en: a reckless disregard for life and limb.
sentences.cn: 毫不顾及他人的生死安危。

sentences.en: Aberdeen is rather out on a limb.
sentences.cn: 阿伯丁市僻处一隅，地位孤立。

sentences.en: an artificial limb
sentences.cn: 假肢

sentences.en: Anyone who could climb all these stairs was sound enough in wind and limb.
sentences.cn: 任何能爬上这么多阶梯的人体格非常强健.

sentences.en: going out on a limb to support unglamorous causes.
sentences.cn: 单枪匹马支持毫无吸引力的事业。

sentences.en: His refusal to agree left him out on a limb.
sentences.cn: 他拒不表示同意,致使自己处于孤立地位.

sentences.en: I risked life and limb to get here on time.
sentences.cn: 我冒着生命危险准时赶到这里.

sentences.en: In medicine, a limb may be lopped off to preserve the body.
sentences.cn: 在医学上, 割一股而保全身.

sentences.en: She sat on a limb of the tree and looked down.
sentences.cn: 她坐在一根大树枝上往下看.

sentences.en: She would be able to stretch out her cramped limbs and rest for a few hours.
sentences.cn: 她将可以伸开蜷缩的四肢，休息几个小时。

sentences.en: Sometimes we even amputate a limb.'
sentences.cn: 有时我们甚至要锯肢. ”

sentences.en: The car was badly smashed, but he was lucky to escape with life and limb.
sentences.cn: 汽车被撞得一塌糊涂, 可他却很幸运地安全脱险了.

sentences.en: The chief artery to the upper limb is the subclavian artery.
sentences.cn: 锁骨下动脉是到上肢的主要动脉.

sentences.en: The police were lucky they found him before I did. I would have torn him limb from limb.
sentences.cn: 警察很幸运，比我先找到了他。不然我真会把他大卸八块的。

sentences.en: They can see themselves going out on a limb, voting for a very controversial energy bill.
sentences.cn: 他们可以预见到要是给极具争议性的能源法案投赞成票，可能会陷入孤立。

sentences.en: This entire rickety structure was hanging from the limb of an enormous leafy tree.
sentences.cn: 这整个快要散架的搭建物吊挂在一棵枝繁叶茂的大树的枝杈上。

sentences.en: Viewers will remember the dashing hero, Dirk, risking life and limb to rescue Daphne from the dragons.
sentences.cn: 观众不会忘记风度翩翩的男主角德克冒着生命危险把达芙妮从恶龙爪下救出的情形。

sentences.en: We tear the enemies limb from limb.
sentences.cn: 我们猛击敌人.

sentences.en: When he reached the highest fork, he crawled out on a limb.
sentences.cn: 他攀到了最上边的分杈处, 便登上一根大树枝.

words.tran_cn: （用于复合词中）有…枝（或肢、翼）的
无肢的；无枝叉的；无翼的

phrases.tran_cn: 处于困境：处于危险、尴尬或易受攻击的境地

trans.tran_cn: 切断…的手足；从…上截下树枝
